name: Gallica
description:
Gallica

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Original Descriptions:

Genres mixed: Bullet Hell + Puzzle

Get to the end of the level and try NOT to die a lot

Best played with a joystick/gamepad (e.g. XBOX 360 controller)

For the best experience, please play it at fullscreen. Graphical quality are lower on web version for performance reasons. If you want the best graphical quality, please download the Windows version below!

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - Move around
  • Space - Select
  • ESC - Exit game

XBOX controls:

  • Left joystick - Move around
  • A - Select
  • Start - Exit game
Credits:

Chan Pei Keong - Programming and music

Isaac Soong Bo Jun - Art and sound effects
